name: About & Chatbot Telegram
description: This bot is used to explain yourself, as well as to chat with someone (like Livegram Bot)

API_ID.description: Enter API_ID, get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: Enter API_HASH, get it from https://my.telegram.org/apps

TOKEN.description: Enter TOKEN, get it from https://t.me/BotFather

OWNER_ID.description: Enter OWNER_ID, start https://t.me/Missrose_bot and type /id

MSG_START.description:
Message to be sent when user clicks /start. Use {} to mention the user who started the bot, `
` to making new line, and Markdown Parse Mode to give markdown.

IMG_START.description: If you want to use an image, enter the telegraph link.

ABOUT_MSG.description:
Message that will be sent when the user presses the about button or when the user sends the /about command. Use `
` to making new line, and Markdown Parse Mode to give markdown.

PROJECTS_MSG.description:
Message that will be sent when the user presses the projects button or when the user sends the /projects command. Use `
` to making new line, and Markdown Parse Mode to give markdown.

SOCMED_MSG.description:
Message that will be sent when the user presses the socmed button or when the user sends the /socmed command. Use `
` to making new line, and Markdown Parse Mode to give markdown.
